nodes.text: Manufactured by Sienar Fleet Systems, Shadow Three was a TIE/LN starfighter affiliated with the Imperial Navy's Shadow wing during the Galactic Civil War fought between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Shadow Three was operated by the TIE pilot PS-29-3, and the TIE fighter had a command system capable of coordinating the combined power of the entire Shadow wing, while its pilot likewise had designs on being Shadow wing's leading pilot.

Shadow Three was introduced on a card for 2001's Premiere expansion set of Decipher, Inc.'s Jedi Knights Trading Card Game, while synonymously being mentioned as gameplay text on PS-29-3's card in the same set.
